        public javafx.geometry.Point2D getMiddlePoint()
        Gets the center point of the tank in terms of its bounds.
        Returns:
        Point2D middlePoint - the center of the tank

      • findCollision

        public int findCollision()
        Returns the class constant for direction if the tank's bounds are touching a black pixel. Will require access to Pixel reader in the future
        Returns:
        The class constant for direction representing the direction of collision

      • go

        public void go(boolean fwd)
        Updates the classes xPos and yPos but does not actually move image node. TODO: Change the way that the position and velocity interface
        Parameters:
        fwd - True if the user is moving foreward. (false for reverse)

      • changeAngle

        public void changeAngle(double angleBy)
        Called when user presses left or right arrow keys. Changes the angle of the tank.
        Parameters:
        angleBy - How many degrees to change the angle of the tank by.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition()
        Actually moves the node to the classes x and y position doubles.

      • setX

        public void setX(double x)
        Sets classes x position value.
        Parameters:
        x - The x value you would like the tank moved to

      • setY

        public void setY(double y)
        Sets classes y position value.
        Parameters:
        y - The y value you would like the tank moved to
